title.narrative: Countries operationally ready to assess and manage identified risks and vulnerabilities

description.narrative: Identification of country risks and vulnerabilities (mapping); global health workforce; emergency supply chain (including prepositioning stockpiles); global pandemic preparedness and readiness; global emergency operation centres (EOC) networks; global laboratory networks; simulation exercises; community engagement/social mobilization at country level.

participating-org.narrative: DG for International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO), European Commission
United Nations Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

mailing-address.narrative: Cit? du Djou?, P.O.Box 06 Brazzaville, Republic of Congo

provider-org.narrative: United Nations Central Emergency Response Fund (CERF)

title.narrative: Triple billion targets - tracking the work of WHO, countries, regions and partners to meet the Triple Billion targets and health-related Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)
Country Cooperation Strategy Brief - Democratic Republic of the Congo (2018)
